verbs.description: I [V: have] long encouraged people to read Richard Hofstadter ’s essay The Paranoid Style in American Politics and his book Anti - Intellectualism in American Life . He was a historian at Cornell who won the Pulitzer prize for that book , which traces the history of periods similar to what we ’re seeing now with Donald Trump . And I believe …
